label: Home
onClick: (app) => { const message = { type: 'launchApp', appId: app.id, label: app.label, location: `apps/${app.id}/index.html` }; if (window.parent !== window) { window.parent.postMessage(message, '*'); } else { console.warn('Not running in an iframe, cannot post message to parent.'); } }

label: Change Theme To Blue
description: Changes the home screen theme to blue
onClick: async (app, appGrid) => { if (!appGrid) { console.error('AppGrid instance was not provided.'); return; } try { const themePath = 'assets/blueTheme/BlueThemeDefinition.json'; console.log(`Attempting to load and save theme: ${themePath}`); const response = await fetch(themePath); if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`Network response was not ok: ${response.statusText}`); const data = await response.json(); let themeUpdated = false; if (data.colors) { console.log('Applying color data...'); const selectors = { topScreen: '.top-screen', bottomScreen: '.bottom-screen', dsContainer: '.ds-container' }; for (const key in selectors) { if (data.colors[key]) { const element = document.querySelector(selectors[key]); if (element) { element.style.backgroundColor = data.colors[key]; } } } themeUpdated = true; } if (data.assets && typeof appGrid.updateAssetUrls === 'function') { console.log('Passing asset data to handler...'); appGrid.updateAssetUrls(data.assets); themeUpdated = true; } if (themeUpdated) { localStorage.setItem('themePath', themePath); console.log('Theme update process complete! Theme selection saved.'); } else { console.warn("Theme file contained no actionable 'assets' or 'colors' data."); } } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to change theme:', error); } }

label: Change Theme To Black
description: Changes the home screen theme to black
onClick: async (app, appGrid) => { if (!appGrid) { console.error('AppGrid instance was not provided.'); return; } try { const themePath = 'assets/blackTheme/BlackThemeDefinition.json'; console.log(`Attempting to load and save theme: ${themePath}`); const response = await fetch(themePath); if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`Network response was not ok: ${response.statusText}`); const data = await response.json(); let themeUpdated = false; if (data.colors) { console.log('Applying color data...'); const selectors = { topScreen: '.top-screen', bottomScreen: '.bottom-screen', dsContainer: '.ds-container' }; for (const key in selectors) { if (data.colors[key]) { const element = document.querySelector(selectors[key]); if (element) { element.style.backgroundColor = data.colors[key]; } } } themeUpdated = true; } if (data.assets && typeof appGrid.updateAssetUrls === 'function') { console.log('Passing asset data to handler...'); appGrid.updateAssetUrls(data.assets); themeUpdated = true; } if (themeUpdated) { localStorage.setItem('themePath', themePath); console.log('Theme update process complete! Theme selection saved.'); } else { console.warn("Theme file contained no actionable 'assets' or 'colors' data."); } } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to change theme:', error); } }

label: Change Theme To Red
description: Changes the home screen theme to red
onClick: async (app, appGrid) => { if (!appGrid) { console.error('AppGrid instance was not provided.'); return; } try { const themePath = 'assets/redTheme/RedThemeDefinition.json'; console.log(`Attempting to load and save theme: ${themePath}`); const response = await fetch(themePath); if (!response.ok) throw new Error(`Network response was not ok: ${response.statusText}`); const data = await response.json(); let themeUpdated = false; if (data.colors) { console.log('Applying color data...'); const selectors = { topScreen: '.top-screen', bottomScreen: '.bottom-screen', dsContainer: '.ds-container' }; for (const key in selectors) { if (data.colors[key]) { const element = document.querySelector(selectors[key]); if (element) { element.style.backgroundColor = data.colors[key]; } } } themeUpdated = true; } if (data.assets && typeof appGrid.updateAssetUrls === 'function') { console.log('Passing asset data to handler...'); appGrid.updateAssetUrls(data.assets); themeUpdated = true; } if (themeUpdated) { localStorage.setItem('themePath', themePath); console.log('Theme update process complete! Theme selection saved.'); } else { console.warn("Theme file contained no actionable 'assets' or 'colors' data."); } } catch (error) { console.error('Failed to change theme:', error); } }
